name: Sheepy Hollow
description:
Sheepy Hollow is in Trouble!

Sheepy Hollow was once a peaceful place with a warm heart for humans, dogs and especially sheeps. But one day, it should all change. Prepare yourself for a never ending fight against your never sleeping enemy and protect your last hope. Protect our sheep.

This game was created for the 46th Ludum Dare game jam with the theme "Keep it alive".

Controls :
  • WASD or ←↓↑→ to move around
  • Mouse to rotate your view
  • TAB to switch dogs
  • SPACE to attack wolf and lead the sheeps
  • SHIFT give your dog a little Break while standing still
  • Escape for pause menu
  • Space-bar to shoot
Team:

Marco Schneider

Philipp Rapp (https://www.artstation.com/philippr95)
